articles.description: Britannia Croissant internship: Britannia is offering Rs 3 lakh for a one-day internship, where the intern's only job will be to correct people who pronounce 'croissant' incorrectly.
articles.content: Britannia is offering a lucrative internship opportunity to one lucky Croissant pronunciation expert. The Indian food products company is offering Rs 3 lakh for a one-day internship where the winners… [+2341 chars]
